sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { AppBar, Toolbar, Typography, Button, Container, Box, Grid, Paper } from '@mui/material';
import { createTheme, ThemeProvider } from '@mui/material/styles';
import LinkedInIcon from '@mui/icons-material/LinkedIn';
import GitHubIcon from '@mui/icons-material/GitHub';
import { Link as ScrollLink, Element } from 'react-scroll';

const theme = createTheme({
  palette: {
    primary: {
      main: '#1976d2',
    },
    secondary: {
      main: '#fff',
    },
  },
  typography: {
    h1: {
      fontSize: '3rem',
      fontWeight: 700,
      marginBottom: '1rem',
    },
    h2: {
      fontSize: '2rem',
      fontWeight: 500,
      marginBottom: '1rem',
    },
    body1: {
      fontSize: '1.25rem',
      marginBottom: '1.5rem',
    },
    button: {
      fontSize: '1rem',
      fontWeight: 600,
    },
  },
});

function HomePage() {
  return (
    <ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
      <AppBar position="sticky" color="primary">
        <Toolbar>
          <Typography variant="h6" style={{ flexGrow: 1 }}>
            Resume Management Tool for LaTeX
          </Typography>
          <Button color="inherit" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/yourprofile" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">
            <LinkedInIcon />
          </Button>
          <Button color="inherit" href="https://github.com/yourprofile" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">
            <GitHubIcon />
          </Button>
        </Toolbar>
      </AppBar>
      <Container maxWidth="lg">
        <Element name="section1" className="element">
          <Box
            display="flex"
            flexDirection="column"
            alignItems="center"
            justifyContent="center"
            height="100vh"
            textAlign="center"
            backgroun-color="linear-gradient(to right, #0d47a1, #42a5f5)"
          >
            <Typography variant="h1" color="primary">
              Welcome to the Resume Management Tool for LaTeX
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="h2" color="textSecondary">
              Simplify your resume creation process with ease
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1" color="textSecondary">
              Our tool helps you manage and generate professional resumes using LaTeX. Get started now by uploading your .tex file and let us handle the rest.
            </Typography>
            <ScrollLink to="section2" smooth duration={1000}>
              <Button variant="contained" color="primary" size="large">
                Learn More
              </Button>
            </ScrollLink>
          </Box>
        </Element>
        <Element name="section2" className="element">
          <Box mt={5} py={5} textAlign="center">
            <Typography variant="h2" color="primary">
              Key Features
            </Typography>
            <Grid container spacing={4} justifyContent="center">
              <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
                <Paper elevation={3} style={{ padding: '2rem', textAlign: 'center' }}>
                  <Typography variant="h5" color="primary">
                    Feature 1
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body1" color="textSecondary">
                    Description of feature 1. Highlight the benefits and functionality.
                  </Typography>
                </Paper>
              </Grid>
              <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
                <Paper elevation={3} style={{ padding: '2rem', textAlign: 'center' }}>
                  <Typography variant="h5" color="primary">
                    Feature 2
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body1" color="textSecondary">
                    Description of feature 2. Explain how this feature can help the user.
                  </Typography>
                </Paper>
              </Grid>
              <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
                <Paper elevation={3} style={{ padding: '2rem', textAlign: 'center' }}>
                  <Typography variant="h5" color="primary">
                    Feature 3
                  </Typography>
                  <Typography variant="body1" color="textSecondary">
                    Description of feature 3. Focus on user experience and benefits.
                  </Typography>
                </Paper>
              </Grid>
            </Grid>
            <ScrollLink to="section3" smooth duration={1000}>
              <Button variant="contained" color="primary" size="large" style={{ marginTop: '2rem' }}>
                Get Started
              </Button>
            </ScrollLink>
          </Box>
        </Element>
        <Element name="section3" className="element">
          <Box mt={5} py={5} textAlign="center">
            <Typography variant="h2" color="primary">
              Get Started with Our Tool
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body1" color="textSecondary" paragraph>
              Upload your LaTeX resume file and see the magic happen. Our tool will process your file and provide you with a professional resume.
            </Typography>
            <Button variant="contained" color="primary" size="large" href="/tool">
              Go to Tool
            </Button>
          </Box>
        </Element>
        <Box mt={5} textAlign="center">
          <Typography variant="body2" color="textSecondary">
            Â© 2024 Your Company Name. All rights reserved.
          </Typography>
        </Box>
      </Container>
    </ThemeProvider>
  );
}

export default HomePage;
